branchCategory.name: Card Motor Controller
branchCategory.description: The LATC4 controller exclusively operates the LAT3 magnetic drive card motor. Laptop software is easy to follow, including screens for step data and I/O setup, as well as monitoring and testing operations. The easier of two step data entry modes requires only target position, positioning time, and load weight.

branchItem.name: LATCA, Card Motor Controller for LAT3 Series
branchItem.description: The LATCA controller is the second controller available for the LAT3 magnetically driven slide table, also known as the card motor.  The LATCA controller adds pulse input and serial input options for control signals, as well as the familiar step data.  Pulse input includes 3 control modes, while serial input permits up to 16 controllers to connect via RS-485 for step data operation.
